title: SSC CGL 2024 Recruitment Notification
examName: Staff Selection Commission Combined Graduate Level
eligibility: Bachelor's degree from a recognized university or equivalent qualification
details: The Staff Selection Commission will conduct Combined Graduate Level Examination, 2024 for recruitment to various Group "B" and Group "C" posts in different Ministries/ Departments/ Organizations of Government of India.

importantDates.label: Last Date for Online Fee Payment
Last Date for Generation of Offline Challan
Last Date for Payment through Challan

title: UPSC Civil Services Examination 2024
department: Indian Administrative Service, Indian Police Service, Indian Foreign Service
eligibility: Bachelor's degree from a recognized university. Age limit: 21-32 years (with age relaxation for reserved categories as per rules)
details: The Civil Services Examination is conducted by UPSC annually in three stages - Preliminary, Main and Interview - for recruitment to various civil services of the Government of India including IAS, IPS, IFS and other central services.

title: IBPS PO XIV Recruitment 2024
examName: Institute of Banking Personnel Selection Probationary Officer
eligibility: Graduate degree in any discipline from a recognized University or equivalent qualification. Age limit: 20-30 years
details: Common Recruitment Process for Probationary Officers/Management Trainees in Participating Banks is conducted by IBPS to recruit eligible candidates for PO/MT posts in various public sector banks.

title: UPSC CDS II 2024 Notification
department: Indian Military Academy, Indian Naval Academy, Air Force Academy, Officers Training Academy
eligibility: For IMA: Degree from a recognized university. For OTA: Degree from a recognized university. Age limits vary by academy
details: The Combined Defence Services Examination (II) is conducted by UPSC for admission to the Indian Military Academy, Indian Naval Academy, Air Force Academy, and Officers Training Academy.

title: NEET UG 2024
eligibility: Class 12 or equivalent with Physics, Chemistry, Biology/Biotechnology. Minimum 50% marks (40% for reserved categories). Age limit: 17-25 years
details: NEET (UG) is the single entrance examination for admission to MBBS, BDS, BAMS, BSMS, BUMS, BHMS and other undergraduate medical courses in approved/recognized Medical/Dental/AYUSH and other Colleges/Deemed Universities/Institutes (AIIMS & JIPMER) in India.
